data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gómez, Samuel, Gerber, Ray, Fuentes-Reinés, Juan Manuel (2017): Redescription of Cletocamptus albuquerquensis and C. dominicanus (Harpacticoida: Canthocamptidae incertae sedis), and description of two new species from the US Virgin Islands and Bonaire. Zootaxa 4272 (3): 301-359, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4272.3.1|54 occurrences
